mapper.sql: SELECT UNIT_VIEW.UNIT_NBR AS CONTENEDOR, TYPE_ISO AS TIPO, TIME_IN AS FECHADESEMBARQUE, TRIM(VESSEL_VISIT_VIEW.VESSEL_NAME) AS BUQUE, TRIM(VESSEL_VISIT_VIEW.VOYAGE_IN) AS VIAJE, 'IMPORT' AS ESTATUS FROM UNIT_VIEW INNER JOIN VESSEL_VISIT_VIEW ON (UNIT_VIEW.IN_VISIT_DETAIL) = TRIM(VESSEL_VISIT_VIEW.VESSEL_VOYAGE) LEFT JOIN EVENT_VIEW T3 ON UNIT_VIEW.UNIT_GKEY = T3.UNIT_GKEY WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EVENT_VIEW WHERE UNIT_VIEW.UNIT_GKEY = EVENT_VIEW.UNIT_GKEY ) AND UNIT_VIEW.LINE_OP NOT IN ('HLC', 'NYK', 'CMA', 'TSH', 'SLI', 'OOL', 'CPL','NCL') AND TRIM(UNIT_VIEW.CATEGORY) = 'IMPRT' AND TRIM(UNIT_VIEW.IN_VISIT_MODE) = 'VESSEL' AND TRIM(UNIT_VIEW.FRGHT_KIND) = 'FCL' AND UNIT_VIEW.CONSIGNEE_ID is null AND UNIT_VIEW.BL_NBR = upper(#{bl}) AND UNIT_VIEW.T_STATE <> 'INBOUND' AND EVENT_ID = 'UNIT_DISCH'
